title: Calories in Cracker Barrel Biscuits
meta_description: Discover calories in Cracker Barrel biscuits per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium details, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard Cracker Barrel restaurant buttermilk biscuit, plain, baked fresh, approximately 56 g each, no added butter or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, batch, and serving size. Values based on average reported data; check Cracker Barrel nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: One Cracker Barrel biscuit contains about 160 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Homemade version with less butter in dough

faqs.q: How many calories in one Cracker Barrel biscuit?
What are the carbs in Cracker Barrel biscuits?
faqs.a: About 20 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 2 g sugars per biscuit.

faqs.q: Are Cracker Barrel biscuits high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 380 mg sodium per biscuit due to baking powder and salt.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Cracker Barrel biscuit?
faqs.a: Roughly 8 g total fat, with 4 g saturated fat per serving.

faqs.q: Do Cracker Barrel biscuits have protein?
faqs.a: A modest 3 g protein per biscuit, mainly from flour and buttermilk.
